question: The energy associated with first orbit is He is [cite: 387]
explanation: Energy <katex>$E_n = -2.18 \times 10^{-18} \times \frac{Z^2}{n^2}$</katex> J. For <katex>$He^+$</katex>, Z=2, n=1. <katex>$E = -2.18 \times 10^{-18} \times 4 = -8.72 \times 10^{-18}$</katex> J. (Note: Question says 'He', likely means <katex>$He^+$</katex> for Bohr model applicability). [cite: 390, 394]
